ThingDef.label: rolling door
ThingDef.description: a locked rolling door.

ThingDef.label: Barrier Gate
ThingDef.description: A barrier gate.

ThingDef.label: road barrier
ThingDef.description: A road barrier designed to block vehicle, it also provides cover on gun fighting.

ThingDef.label: fuel barrel
ThingDef.description: A barrel filled with fuel.

ThingDef.label: ventilation fan
ThingDef.description: An active ventilation fan,it seems to be used to discharge heat from underground spaces.

ThingDef.label: lift shaft
ThingDef.description: A large elevator shaft leads to the underground area, large enough to transport vehicles, but apparently there is no way to activate it.

ThingDef.label: lift Shaft
ThingDef.description: A large elevator shaft leads to the underground area, large enough to transport vehicles, but apparently there is no way to activate it.

ThingDef.label: lift Shaft
ThingDef.description: A large elevator shaft leads to the underground area, large enough to transport vehicles, but apparently there is no way to activate it.

ThingDef.Name: BaseDerelictMech
ThingDef.description: a derelict automatroid that has decommissioned due to severe aging or heavy damage. its instruments were mostly removed. waiting for people to discover its remaining value.

ThingDef.Name: BaseDeactivatedMech
ThingDef.description: a derelict automatroid that has decommissioned due to severe aging or heavy damage. its instruments were partially removed. waiting for people to discover its remaining value.

ThingDef.Name: BaseInactivatedMech
ThingDef.description: an automatroid that has been completely shut down for maintenance, with most of its parts intact and ready for use.

ConceptDef.label: hacking deactivated mech
ConceptDef.helpText: You discovered a mech that is not yet activated. If you have a mechanitor colonists capable of hacking it, you may be able to claim it as your own.

ThingDef.label: cargo container
ThingDef.description: A standard issue container containing military supplies.

ThingDef.label: military crate
ThingDef.description: A standard issue equipmet crate containing military supplies.These equipment and boxes seemed to have been produced recently and sent to various locations along with the missions.

ThingDef.label: military parcel
ThingDef.description: A Standard issue parcel containing supplies for military logistics. These parcel seemed to have been produced recently and sent to various locations.

ThingDef.label: facility dormer
ThingDef.description: A structure flooring with a opened hole, commonly found in underground facilities.

ThingDef.label: facility power generator
ThingDef.description: A large power generation facility half buried in the structure, commonly found in underground facilities.

ThingDef.label: facility wall
ThingDef.description: A structure with waterproof layers, commonly found in underground facilities.

ThingDef.label: facility wall
ThingDef.description: A structure with waterproof layers, commonly found in underground facilities.

ThingDef.label: facility wall
ThingDef.description: A structure with waterproof layers, commonly found in underground facilities.

ThingDef.label: facility door
ThingDef.description: Divides rooms. allows people to move through the door without slowing down.

ThingDef.label: facility wall lamp
ThingDef.description: A wall-mounted lamp that lights an area using electricity. It is less powerful than a standing lamp, but can be mounted on walls.

ThingDef.label: facility floor lamp
ThingDef.description: An emergency floor light with built-in energy source that can illuminate a small area.

ThingDef.label: Centralized Command Core
ThingDef.description: A command core used to coordinate large-scaled automatroid squads, it have the ability to independently command and support an entire combined combat brigade without any further assist.

ThingDef.label: Process Array
ThingDef.description:
An array machine processes the received signal and directs it to a specific mechanitor. This adds 4 bandwidth to that mechanitor's total, allowing them to control more mechanoids.

Once a process array is constructed, it can be quickly tuned to a mechanitor. However, returning a band node to a different mechanitor takes significantly longer.

This Device follows the N.A.C.S. protocol so only Mechlinks with following the protocol can receieve the service.

ThingDef.label: electirc arc furnace
ThingDef.description: A heavy machinery that recycles all sort of metallic pieces into steel, will generates a lot of heat.

ThingDef.label: pyrolysis plant
ThingDef.description: A heavy machinery that recycles all sort of organic pieces into chemfuel, will generates a lot of heat.
